content:
Email 1 - Invite:

Subject: Invitation: VIP Dinner at Michelin Star Restaurant The Ninth with 6sense

Hi {{First Name}},

We understand the challenges that sales and marketing teams are currently facing, and we want to help. That’s why we’re inviting you to join us for an exclusive VIP dinner at Michelin star restaurant The Ninth in London.

Hosted by 6sense’s SVP of Sales, Mark Ebert, and VP of Sales EMEA, Paul Gilhooly, the dinner will bring together CROs and VPs of Sales from leading B2B businesses. This is an opportunity to network with your peers and discuss the challenges and solutions of account-based sales strategies.

Details of the dinner:
When: 25th April from 18:30pm to 22:30pm
Where: Private Room at Michelin star restaurant The Ninth, London, 22 Charlotte St, W1T 2NB
Other attendees: No partner companies involved, just 6sense and revenue leaders like yourself.

We hope you can join us for an exceptional dinner and insightful conversation. Please reply to RSVP.

Best regards,

Email 2 - Reminder:

Subject: Reminder: VIP Dinner at The Ninth with 6sense

Hi {{First Name}},

I wanted to remind you of our upcoming VIP dinner at Michelin star restaurant The Ninth in London. This is a chance to network with CROs and VPs of Sales from leading B2B businesses and discuss the challenges and solutions of account-based sales strategies.

Details of the dinner:
When: 25th April from 18:30pm to 22:30pm
Where: Private Room at Michelin star restaurant The Ninth, London, 22 Charlotte St, W1T 2NB
Other attendees: No partner companies involved, just 6sense and revenue leaders like yourself.

Your hosts for the evening will be 6sense’s SVP of Sales, Mark Ebert, and VP of Sales EMEA, Paul Gilhooly. We hope you can join us for an exceptional dinner and insightful conversation.

Please let us know if you can make it by replying to this email.

Best regards,

Email 3 - Referral:

Subject: Invitation: VIP Dinner at The Ninth with 6sense (Referral)

Hi {{First Name}},

We are hosting a VIP dinner at Michelin star restaurant The Ninth in London and we would love to invite a senior colleague from your revenue team to join us. This is an opportunity to network with CROs and VPs of Sales from leading B2B businesses and discuss the challenges and solutions of account-based sales strategies.

Details of the dinner:
When: 25th April from 18:30pm to 22:30pm
Where: Private Room at Michelin star restaurant The Ninth, London, 22 Charlotte St, W1T 2NB
Other attendees: No partner companies involved, just 6sense and revenue leaders like yourself.

Your colleague will be hosted by 6sense’s SVP of Sales, Mark Ebert, and VP of Sales EMEA, Paul Gilhooly. We hope they can join us for an exceptional dinner and insightful conversation.

Please let us know if there is someone from your revenue team that you would like to refer for the dinner by replying to this email.

Best regards,
